entries.journal_entry_description: Find the survivor and escort them back to HX-138.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the survivor and bring them back to the camp.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: [HX-138] Great work. Now make sure the survivor doesn't get killed.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Follow the survivor and make sure they reach the destination.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Speak to the survivor to make sure they are alright.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: [HX-138] You have to protect the survivors! Report back to me immediately.
